skating_freeze.actionBarDescription: Activate to freeze the area and gain momentum more quickly

SORCERER_EXPLOSION_TIER_1.actionBarDescription: Collect alchemy crystals to use this ability. Upgrade to the next level at 5 crystals

enter_knight_shield_defensive_stance.actionBarDescription: Take reduced damage with slower movement speed and gain a shield attack.

rebellion_shield.actionBarDescription: Consume all stacks of Triumph to shield nearby allies and enchance Aura effect

void_knight_consume_emerald.actionBarDescription: Consume emeralds to feed the Void Corruption within you and grow stronger.

void_knight_consume_iron.actionBarDescription: Consume iron to feed the Void Corruption within you and grow stronger.

summon_heal_spirit.actionBarDescription: Use a summon stone to summon a spirit that specializes in healing.

consume_life_foce.actionBarDescription: Consume life force to heal yourself.

SORCERER_EXPLOSION_TIER_4.actionBarDescription: Collect alchemy crystals to use this ability. Upgrade to the next level at 12 crystals

airbender_tornado.actionBarDescription: Create a sandstorm that follows you. Enemies in range are pulled toward the center and take light damage over time. Blocks enemy projectiles.

airbender_moving_tornado.actionBarDescription: Create a sandstorm that moves forward. Enemies in range are pulled toward the center and take light damage over time. Blocks enemy projectiles.

void_knight_ascend.actionBarDescription: Allow the Void to grant you its full power and temporarily ascend to a higher form.

SORCERER_EXPLOSION_TIER_2.actionBarDescription: Collect alchemy crystals to use this ability. Upgrade to the next level at 7 crystals

skeleton_ability.actionBarDescription: Start creating poison clouds around you for a period of time that slow enemies and deal poison damage

FIREWORK_BACKPACK.actionBarDescription: Launch yourself into the air! Also activates automatically upon reaching the void.

hand_gun.actionBarDescription: Deals damage and marks all enemies in front. The impulse will also knock you backward.

berserker_rage.actionBarDescription: Activate to gain break speed, prevent knockback, and reduce incoming damage.

cactus_fire.actionBarDescription: Siphon life essence from nearby enemies and gain max HP permanently.

void_walker_warp.actionBarDescription: Warp ahead and create a portal that you can return to later. Gives you Rift Madness

BH_HIDER_TAUNT_SOUND.actionBarName: Play a sound to taunt nearby hunters!

void_hunter_mark.actionBarDescription: Send Fenrir to mark an enemy. Deal increased damage to them, gain speed on their trail, and see them through walls. Cooldown reduced if you miss, instantly reset if you kill your mark.

summon_attack_spirit.actionBarDescription: Use a summon stone to summon a spirit that specializes in attacking.

yeti_glacial_roar.actionBarDescription: Roar to freeze nearby blocks and make them brittle.

disable_life_force_attack.actionBarDescription: Disable to stop using life force to increase damage on melee and ranged attacks.

enable_life_force_attack.actionBarDescription: Enable to consume life force in exchange for increased damage on melee and ranged attacks.

SORCERER_EXPLOSION_TIER_3.actionBarDescription: Collect alchemy crystals to use this ability. Upgrade to the next level at 8 crystals

open_black_market.actionBarDescription: Summons the black market in front of you. You receive 2% of the profits

electrify_jellyfish.actionBarDescription: Enemies near Marina's jellyfish are electrified, taking damage. The more jellyfish that are connected, the more damage they will do.

void_walker_rewind.actionBarDescription: Warp back to your last portal. Does NOT give Rift Madness

skating_jump.actionBarDescription: Enables at high speeds! Activate to jump and dodge an attack

super_melody_aura.actionBarDescription: Continously heal nearby allies and damage enemies

BH_HIDER_TAUNT_FIREWORK.actionBarName: Send up a firework to taunt nearby hunters!

change_spirit_affinity.actionBarDescription: Change what type of spirit you send out.

SORCERER_EXPLOSION_TIER_5.actionBarDescription: Collect alchemy crystals to use this ability

void_hunter_detonate.actionBarDescription: Detonate your active mark, removing it and dealing damage. You will lose buffs against the target, so use wisely!

bounty_hunter_reroll.actionBarDescription: Reroll your current bounty for a new one.
